Entries.default: You have barely cleared Sayuka harbor when a sleek half-galley appears off of your port bow. It rides high in the water and fast, but keeps its distance as it approaches land.

As the Misery's Delight comes alongside, Malnaj stands on the railing, one gray-furred hand wrapped tight about a thick hemp line. She bows low, doffing her hat, and then tosses it to one of her deckhands.
Serafen watches the ship's passage from the bulwark, expression grim.
When the ship turns to pursue you, you recognize it as Malnaj's vessel, the Misery's Delight. Its cannons don't seem primed, and it aims to come along side rather than set up for a broadside run.

"Looks like the high queen sea-devil be wanting words, cap. Not sure if that be good or ill, but at least it'll mean she ain't on Sayuka."

Serafen's ears angle slightly back, and he massages the bridge of his nose.
